name: Golfoween
description:
In the first time, you must bring the ball to the end of the course. In the next levels, you must do the balls hit together.
This game was developed during a "8 hours Private Game Jam " which aimed to show to people who has never seen an ambiant like this.

Commands are " 4-8-6-2" and "1-7-9-3 " from your numpad.

Golfoween has been made by :

  • Raphaël Stella - Programmer gameplay
  • Loic Mouray - Programmer UI
  • Martin Calujek - Level Designer
  • Thibaut Chergui - Fx Artist
  • Lionel Martin - 3D Artist
